mergewith.subtemplate:
<branchRateModel id="FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" spec="beast.evolution.branchratemodel.UCRelaxedClockModel" rates="@fastRates.c:$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"> <LogNormal id="FastLogNormalDistributionModel.c:$(n)" S="@fastUcldStdev.c:$(n)" meanInRealSpace="true" name="distr"> <M spec="parameter.RealParameter" estimate="false">1</M> </LogNormal> <parameter id="fastUcldMean.c:$(n)" estimate="false" name="clock.rate">1.0</parameter> </branchRateModel>
<parameter id="fastUcldStdev.c:$(n)" lower="0.0" name="stateNode">0.1</parameter> <parameter id="fastRates.c:$(n)" lower="0.0" upper ="5" dimension="1">1</parameter>
<prior id="FastRatePriorDistrbution.c:$(n)" name="distribution" x="@fastRates.c:$(n)"> <LogNormal S="@fastUcldStdev.c:$(n)" meanInRealSpace="true" name="distr"> <M spec="parameter.RealParameter" estimate="false">1</M> </LogNormal> </prior> <prior id="fastUcldStdevPrior.c:$(n)" name="distribution" x="@fastUcldStdev.c:$(n)"> <LogNormal meanInRealSpace="false" name="distr"> <M spec="parameter.RealParameter" estimate="false">-2</M> <S spec="parameter.RealParameter" estimate="false">0.1</S> </LogNormal> </prior> <prior id="fastUcldMeanPrior.c:$(n)" name="distribution" x="@fastUcldMean.c:$(n)"> <Gamma alpha="100.0" beta="0.01" name="distr"/> </prior>
<operator id="FastInternalnodesOperator.c:$(n)" spec="consoperators.InConstantDistanceOperator" branchRateModel="@FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" twindowSize="0.02" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rates="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="20"/>
<operator id="FastRootOperator1.c:$(n)" spec="consoperators.SimpleDistance" branchRateModel="@FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" twindowSize="0.02" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rates="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="2"/>
<operator id="FastRootOperator2.c:$(n)" spec="consoperators.SmallPulley" branchRateModel="@FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" dwindowSize="0.02" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rates="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="2"/>
<operator id="FastRootOperator3.c:$(n)" spec="consoperators.BigPulley" branchRateModel="@FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" twindowSize="0.02" dwindowSize="0.032" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rates="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="2"/>
<operator id="fastUcldStdevScaler.c:$(n)" spec="ScaleOperator" parameter="@fastUcldStdev.c:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.5" weight="5.0"/>
<operator id="fastUcldMeanScaler.c:$(n)" spec="ScaleOperator" parameter="@fastUcldMean.c:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.5" weight="5.0"/>
<operator id="RatesRandomWalk.c:$(n)" spec="RealRandomWalkOperator" parameter="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="1.0" windowSize="0.1"/>
<operator id="RatesSwapOperator.c:$(n)" spec="SwapOperator" parameter="@fastRates.c:$(n)" weight="1.0"/>
<log id="fastRates" spec="beast.evolution.branchratemodel.RateStatistic" branchratemodel="@FastRelaxedClock.c:$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/>
Scale clock rate of partition c:$(n)
Scale stdev of rate of partition c:$(n)
Change internal rates of partition c:$(n)
Change root rates 1 of partition c:$(n)
Change root rates 2 of partition c:$(n)
Change root rates 3 of partition c:$(n)
Change all rates of partition c:$(n)
Change all rates of partition c:$(n)
fast uncorrelated lognormal relaxed clock stdev of partition c:$(n)
fast uncorrelated lognormal relaxed clock mean of partition c:$(n)
fast uncorrelated lognormal relaxed clock rates of partition c:$(n)
